title: Immersive Experience
text: Each group will have a virtual space where users can interact with each other and have fun.

title: Private or Group chat
text: A true community-driven wallet-based social app that users can create groups or chat with someone. Users can token gate their group or assign role by NFTs or crypto.

title: Avatars
text: Users can represent themselves as their NFTs and dress them up with wearables earned by interacting with the app and community.
